member.name: T:Cake.Issues.PullRequests.AppVeyor.AppVeyorBuildsAliases
member.summary: Contains functionality related to writing code analysis issues to AppVeyor builds.

member.returns: Object for writing issues to AppVeyor builds.

example.para: Report code analysis issues reported as MsBuild warnings to an AppVeyor build:

member.returns: Object for writing issues to AppVeyor builds.

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.PullRequests.AppVeyor.AppVeyorBuildSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Cake.Issues.PullRequests.AppVeyor.AppVeyorBuildSettings.MessagePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern of the message to display. See for possible patterns. The default value is: "Project: {ProjectName}, File: {FilePath}, Line: {Line}".

member.name: P:Cake.Issues.PullRequests.AppVeyor.AppVeyorBuildSettings.DetailsPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern of the message details to display. See for possible patterns. The default value is: "{Rule}: {MessageText}".

member.summary: Class for posting issues to AppVeyor.

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.PullRequests.AppVeyor.IIssueExtensions.ToAppVeyorMessageCategoryType(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns the corresponding category of an AppVeyor message for an issue priority.
